data.name: AbyssJewel
data.value: Item Class: Abyss Jewel Rarity: Magic Hypnotic Eye Jewel of Force -------- Abyss -------- Requirements: Level: 36 -------- Item Level: 47 -------- Adds 7 to 8 Physical Damage to Spells -------- Place into an Abyssal Socket on an Item or into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket. -------- Note: ~price 1 jewellers

data.name: ArcaneSurgeSupport
data.value: Item Class: Support Skill Gems Rarity: Gem Arcane Surge Support -------- Support, Spell, Duration Level: 9 Cost & Reservation Multiplier: 130% Quality: +10% (augmented) -------- Requirements: Level: 28 Int: 48 -------- Each supported spell will track how much mana you spend on it, granting a buff when the total mana spent reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. -------- Gain Arcane Surge after Spending a total of 51 Mana with a Supported Skill Arcane Surge grants 14% more Spell Damage Arcane Surge grants 14% increased Cast Speed Arcane Surge grants 0.7% of Mana Regenerated per second Arcane Surge lasts 4 seconds Supported Skills deal 5% increased Spell Damage Supported Skills deal 14% more Spell Damage while you have Arcane Surge -------- Experience: 1/283,759 -------- This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Active Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

data.name: ArcardeMap
data.value: Item Class: Maps Rarity: Normal Arcade Map -------- Map Tier: 8 Atlas Region: Glennach Cairns -------- Item Level: 75 -------- Travel to this Map by using it in a personal Map Device. Maps can only be used once.

data.name: BlightedSpiderLairMap
data.value: Item Class: Maps Rarity: Normal Blighted Spider Lair Map -------- Map Tier: 9 Atlas Region: Glennach Cairns -------- Item Level: 76 -------- Area is infested with Fungal Growths Map's Item Quantity Modifiers also affect Blight Chest count at 20% value (implicit) Natural inhabitants of this area have been removed (implicit) -------- Travel to this Map by using it in a personal Map Device. Maps can only be used once.

data.name: BloodProgenitorsBrain
data.value: Item Class: Metamorph Sample Rarity: Unique Blood Progenitor's Brain -------- Uses: Mass Frenzy -------- Item Level: 73 -------- Drops additional Currency Items Drops additional Currency Items Drops additional Rare Armour -------- Combine this with four other different samples in Tane's Laboratory.

data.name: BoonOfJustice
data.value: Item Class: Divination Card Rarity: Divination Card Boon of Justice -------- Stack Size: 1/6 -------- Offering to the Goddess -------- Some gifts are obligations while others are simply opportunities.

data.name: ChaosOrb
data.value: Item Class: Stackable Currency Rarity: Currency Chaos Orb -------- Stack Size: 152/10 -------- Reforges a rare item with new random modifiers -------- Right click this item then left click a rare item to apply it. Shift click to unstack.

data.name: ClearOil
data.value: Item Class: Stackable Currency Rarity: Currency Clear Oil -------- Stack Size: 6/10 -------- Can be combined with other Oils at Cassia to Enchant Rings or Amulets, or to modify Blighted Maps. Shift click to unstack.

data.name: DaressosDefiance
data.value: Item Class: Body Armours Rarity: Unique Daresso's Defiance Full Dragonscale -------- Armour: 1330 (augmented) Evasion Rating: 1056 (augmented) -------- Requirements: Level: 63 Str: 115 (unmet) Dex: 94 -------- Sockets: R R-R -------- Item Level: 71 -------- 183% increased Armour and Evasion +90 to maximum Life 0.42% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life 6% chance to Dodge Attack Hits You lose all Endurance Charges when Hit You gain an Endurance Charge on Kill You gain Onslaught for 5 seconds per Endurance Charge when Hit 84% increased Onslaught Effect -------- "When your back is against the wall, And your opponent is bleeding you dry, There is only one appropriate response: Unbridled, overwhelming violence." - Daresso, the Sword King

data.name: DivineVessel
data.value: Item Class: Map Fragments Rarity: Normal Divine Vessel -------- Unique Boss deals 10% increased Damage Unique Boss has 10% increased Attack and Cast Speed Unique Boss has 10% increased Life Unique Boss has 20% increased Area of Effect -------- Power is a curious thing. It can be contained, hidden, locked away, and yet it always breaks free. -------- Can be used in a personal Map Device, allowing you to capture the Soul of the Map's Boss. The Vessel containing the captured Soul can be retrieved from the Map Device. You must be in the Map when the boss is defeated.

data.name: FarricChieftain
data.value: Item Class: Stackable Currency Rarity: Rare Gorespine Farric Chieftain -------- Genus: Ape Chieftains Group: Primates Family: The Wilds -------- Item Level: 76 -------- Farric Presence Aspect of the Hellion Allies Regenerate Life Quick Accurate Summons Apes from Trees -------- Right-click to add this to your bestiary. -------- Note: ~price 1 chaos

data.name: HallowedLifeFlask
data.value: Item Class: Life Flasks Rarity: Normal Superior Hallowed Life Flask -------- Quality: +15% (augmented) Recovers 2289 (augmented) Life over 8 Seconds Consumes 10 of 30 Charges on use Currently has 0 Charges -------- Requirements: Level: 42 -------- Item Level: 72 -------- Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

data.name: HallowedManaFlask
data.value: Item Class: Mana Flasks Rarity: Normal Superior Hallowed Mana Flask -------- Quality: +20% (augmented) Recovers 840 (augmented) Mana over 6 Seconds Consumes 6 of 30 Charges on use Currently has 0 Charges -------- Requirements: Level: 42 -------- Item Level: 73 -------- Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

data.name: HeistBrooch
data.value: Item Class: Heist Brooch Rarity: Normal Silver Brooch -------- Any Heist member can equip this item. -------- Requirements: Level 2 in Any Job -------- Item Level: 69 -------- 12% increased Rarity of Items dropped in Heists (implicit) -------- Can only be equipped to Heist members. -------- Note: ~price 1 alch

data.name: HeistCloak
data.value: Item Class: Heist Cloak Rarity: Magic Initiator's Torn Cloak -------- Any Heist member can equip this item. -------- Requirements: Level 2 in Any Job -------- Item Level: 62 -------- 2% reduced raising of Alert Level (implicit) -------- 27% increased Damage with Hits against Enemies on Full Life Players deal 27% increased Damage with Hits against Enemies on Full Life -------- Can only be equipped to Heist members.

data.name: HeistGear
data.value: Item Class: Heist Gear Rarity: Rare Kraken Instrument Rough Sharpening Stone -------- Any Heist member can equip this item. -------- Requirements: Level 2 in Any Job -------- Item Level: 69 -------- 15% increased Melee Damage (implicit) -------- The Ring's Cut reduced by 9% 5% increased time before Lockdown 11% increased Job speed -------- Can only be equipped to Heist members.

data.name: HeistTarget
data.value: Item Class: Heist Target Rarity: Currency Alchemical Chalice -------- "The chalice holds certain properties that make scientists quite possessive and irrational. It's best if you don't ask too many questions about this one." -------- Can be exchanged with Faustus, the Fence in The Rogue Harbour

data.name: HeistTool
data.value: Item Class: Heist Tool Rarity: Rare Entropy Gear Lustrous Ward -------- This item can be equipped by: Niles, the Interrogator Nenet, the Scout Gianna, the Master of Disguise -------- Requirements: Level 3 in Counter-Thaumaturgy -------- Item Level: 75 -------- 9% increased Counter-Thaumaturgy speed (implicit) -------- 39% increased Damage +1 to Character Level 5% chance to not generate Alert Level on opening a Chest using Counter-Thaumaturgy -------- Can only be equipped to Heist members.

data.name: InscribedUltimatum
data.value: Item Class: Misc Map Items Rarity: Currency Inscribed Ultimatum -------- Challenge: Defeat waves of enemies Area Level: 71 Requires Sacrifice: Forbidden Taste Reward: Great Old One's Tentacles -------- Choking Miasma III Restless Ground II Escalating Monster Speed Hindering Flasks -------- Can be used in a personal map device to open portals to the Trialmaster's Domain and attempt his challenge. Portals will close once the challenge begins.

data.name: KitavaTeachings
data.value: Item Class: Jewel Rarity: Unique Kitava's Teachings Small Cluster Jewel -------- Item Level: 72 -------- Adds Disciple of Kitava -------- Savour the bitter, cherish the sweet, For there may never be another chance to eat. -------- Place into an allocated Small, Medium or Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket. -------- Note: ~price 1.2 exalted

data.name: MavenInvitation
data.value: Item Class: Misc Map Items Rarity: Rare Zenith Passage Maven's Invitation: New Vastir -------- Item Quantity: +68% (augmented) Item Rarity: +40% (augmented) -------- Item Level: 83 -------- Area has patches of Chilled Ground Monsters have 393% increased Critical Strike Chance +43% to Monster Critical Strike Multiplier 27% increased Monster Movement Speed 45% increased Monster Attack Speed 40% increased Monster Cast Speed Monsters gain a Power Charge on Hit Monsters cannot be Taunted Monsters' Action Speed cannot be modified to below base value -------- For those who must not endure it, there may be found a perverse joy in watching the struggle for survival. -------- Can be used in a personal Map Device. Modifiers to Item Quantity will affect the number of encounter rewards dropped. -------- Note: ~price 2 chaos

data.name: NoxiousCatalyst
data.value: Item Class: Stackable Currency Rarity: Currency Noxious Catalyst -------- Stack Size: 4/10 -------- Adds quality that enhances Physical and Chaos Damage modifiers on a ring, amulet or belt Replaces other quality types -------- Right click this item then left click a ring, amulet or belt to apply it. Has greater effect on lower-rarity jewellery. The maximum quality is 20%. Shift click to unstack.

data.name: PerfectFossil
data.value: Item Class: Stackable Currency Rarity: Currency Perfect Fossil -------- Stack Size: 1/20 Applies to: Weapons, Body Armour, Gloves, Boots, Helmets, Shields, Maps -------- Improved Quality -------- Place in a Resonator to influence item crafting.

data.name: PowerfulChaoticResonator
data.value: Item Class: Delve Stackable Socketable Currency Rarity: Currency Powerful Chaotic Resonator -------- Stack Size: 1/10 Requires 3 Socketed Fossils -------- Sockets: D D D -------- Reforges a rare item with new random modifiers -------- All sockets must be filled with Fossils before this item can be used.

data.name: Reefbane
data.value: Item Class: Fishing Rods Rarity: Unique Reefbane Fishing Rod -------- Fishing Rod Physical Damage: 8-15 Critical Strike Chance: 5.00% Attacks per Second: 1.20 Weapon Range: 13 -------- Sockets: R G -------- Item Level: 84 -------- 40% increased Cast Speed Thaumaturgical Lure 10% increased Quantity of Fish Caught Glows while in an Area containing a Unique Fish -------- He cast far into the ocean And tore out her heart.

data.name: RitualSplinter
data.value: Item Class: Stackable Currency Rarity: Currency Ritual Splinter -------- Stack Size: 9/100 -------- Combine 100 Splinters to create a Ritual Vessel. Shift click to unstack.

data.name: RustedReliquaryScarab
data.value: Item Class: Map Fragments Rarity: Normal Rusted Reliquary Scarab -------- 50% more Unique Items found in Area -------- The Maraketh left you to die alone in the desert, young Sumei, but we saw the potential in you. The Order of the Djinn is your akhara now. -------- Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.

data.name: SacredHybridFlask
data.value: Item Class: Hybrid Flasks Rarity: Normal Superior Sacred Hybrid Flask -------- Quality: +20% (augmented) Recovers 1728 (augmented) Life over 5 Seconds Recovers 480 (augmented) Mana over 5 Seconds Consumes 20 of 40 Charges on use Currently has 0 Charges -------- Requirements: Level: 50 -------- Item Level: 78 -------- Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

data.name: SacrificeAtMidnight
data.value: Item Class: Map Fragments Rarity: Normal Sacrifice at Midnight -------- Look to our Queen, for she will lead us into the light. -------- Can be used in a personal Map Device.

data.name: ScreamingEssenceOfWoe
data.value:
Item Class: Stackable Currency Rarity: Currency Screaming Essence of Woe -------- Stack Size: 4/9 -------- Upgrades a normal item to rare or reforges a rare item, guaranteeing one property
One Handed Weapon: (50-66)% increased Spell Damage Two Handed Weapon: (85-106)% increased Spell Damage Body Armour: (50-61) to maximum Energy Shield Helmet: (39-45) to maximum Energy Shield Shield: (50-59) to maximum Energy Shield Other Armour: (27-32) to maximum Energy Shield Quiver: (30-34)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills Amulet: (14-16)% increased maximum Energy Shield Ring: (27-31) to maximum Energy Shield Belt: (27-31) to maximum Energy Shield -------- Right click this item then left click a normal or rare item to apply it. Shift click to unstack.

data.name: SimulacrumSplinter
data.value: Item Class: Stackable Currency Rarity: Currency Simulacrum Splinter -------- Stack Size: 61/300 -------- Combine 300 Splinters to create a Simulacrum. Shift click to unstack.

data.name: SmallClusterJewel
data.value: Item Class: Jewel Rarity: Magic Notable Small Cluster Jewel -------- Requirements: Level: 54 -------- Item Level: 72 -------- Adds 3 Passive Skills (enchant) Added Small Passive Skills grant: +15% to Lightning Resistance (enchant) -------- 1 Added Passive Skill is Pure Commander -------- Place into an allocated Small, Medium or Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.

data.name: SplinterOfTul
data.value: Item Class: Stackable Currency Rarity: Currency Splinter of Tul -------- Stack Size: 4/100 -------- Combine 100 Splinters to create Tul's Breachstone. Shift click to unstack.

data.name: ThiefTrinket
data.value: Item Class: Trinkets Rarity: Rare Carrion Ornament Thief's Trinket -------- Item Level: 65 -------- 2% chance to receive additional Gem items when opening a Reward Chest in a Heist 2% chance in Heists for Orbs of Transmutation to drop as Chaos Orbs instead 10% increased Rarity of Items dropped in Heists -------- You must find the sculpture The Catch in a Smuggler's Den or Underbelly Blueprint to be able to equip this -------- Corrupted

data.name: TimelessEternalEmpireSplinter
data.value: Item Class: Stackable Currency Rarity: Currency Timeless Eternal Empire Splinter -------- Stack Size: 16/100 -------- Combine 100 Splinters to create a Timeless Eternal Emblem. Shift click to unstack.

data.name: TributeToTheGoddess
data.value: Item Class: Map Fragments Rarity: Normal Tribute to the Goddess -------- You may appeal to the Goddess for another verdict, but justice favours only the truly worthy. -------- Travel to the Aspirants' Plaza and spend this item to open the Eternal Labyrinth of Fortune. You must have completed the six different Trials of Ascendancy found in Maps in order to access this area.

data.name: ViridianJewel
data.value: Item Class: Jewel Rarity: Rare Blight Glisten Viridian Jewel -------- Item Level: 75 -------- 14% increased Fire Damage 6% increased Projectile Speed 19% increased Burning Damage -------- Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

data.name: VoidSphere
data.value: Item Class: Active Skill Gems Rarity: Gem Void Sphere -------- Spell, AoE, Duration, Physical, Chaos, Orb Level: 1 Cost: 30 Mana Cooldown Time: 10.00 sec Cast Time: 0.60 sec Critical Strike Chance: 5.00% Effectiveness of Added Damage: 55% Quality: +20% (augmented) -------- Requirements: Level: 34 Int: 79 -------- Creates a Void Sphere which Hinders enemies in an area around it, with the debuff being stronger on enemies closer to the sphere. It also regularly releases pulses of area damage. The Void Sphere will consume the corpses of any enemies which die in its area. Can only have one Void Sphere at a time. -------- Deals 27 to 41 Physical Damage Base duration is 5.00 seconds Pulses every 0.40 seconds 40% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage 10% increased Area of Effect Enemies in range are Hindered, with up to 30% reduced Movement Speed, based on distance from the Void Sphere -------- Experience: 1/252,595 -------- Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.
